privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy_policy.data_collection_desc: We collect information such as your name, phone number, and medical history solely for appointment scheduling and clinical management.
privacy_policy.data_usage_desc: Your data is used to manage your queue position, send notifications, and provide medical staff with necessary clinical context.
privacy_policy.data_protection_desc: We use industry-standard encryption and secure databases (Firebase) to ensure your information remains confidential.
privacy_policy.third_party_desc: We use Meta (WhatsApp) for notifications and Google Drive for secure file storage. Each service has its own privacy standards.

terms_of_use.title: Terms of Use
terms_of_use.acceptance_desc: By using this application, you agree to comply with our scheduling rules and respect clinic policies.
terms_of_use.user_conduct_desc: Users must provide accurate information and arrive on time for their appointments.
terms_of_use.cancellation_desc: Please cancel or reschedule appointments at least 24 hours in advance if you cannot attend.
terms_of_use.liability_desc: The application provides estimated times which may vary based on clinical requirements. We are not liable for delays.
